page.title: 01BRANSCOMBE VILLAGE.
page.content: Most of the houses in Branscombe are 100 years old.There are a few farms in Branscombe and it is very hilly.I like living in Branscombe, it has got lots of paths ,tracks and lanes.The post office is at the bottom of the school lane.It is peaceful and the village people often hold coffee mornings in the village hall. The walks around Branscombe go through woods and fields. The stream that runs down through the valley starts from a spring which rises by Beehive near where I live. I don't know if it comes from an under ground stream.Lots of flowers grow on the hills and blackberries grow on the cliff.The beach is pebbly. The houses are spread out and the village post office is in the middle of the village.About 100 yards down the road from the Church.
